evidence.text: Plaintiffs bring this action to seek relief for the immediate harms that defendants and their directives are causing to state research institutions.
The Court finds that there is no just reason to delay entry of judgment on that claim.
This action arises under U.S. Constitution; the APA, 5 U.S.C. §701 et seq.; the Public Health Service Act (PHSA), 42 U.S.C. §201 et seq.; and federal regulations governing NIH grants.
